item.title: Umgang mit Bildern
item.description: To improve the loading performance of our webpages we make use of responsive images. This can be done the following way. Guide Include the macro at the very top of the twig templates. your-template.twig {% import 'macros/responsive-images.twig' as responsiveImage %} Use the macro We can make use of the macro by executing its displayResponsiveImage function: {{ responsiveImage.displayResponsiveImage(image) }} Notice: The above code will not work, since we haven’t declared the image variable so far.
